Package: org.codehaus.groovy.grails.webflow.mvc.servlet

[Java] Class GrailsFlowHandlerMapping

            • org.codehaus.groovy.grails.webflow.mvc.servlet.GrailsFlowHandlerMapping

            • A HandlerMapping implementation that maps Grails controller classes onto flows.

              Authors:
              Graeme Rocher
              Since:
              1.2
